content.rendered:
Disposable infusion set

  1. Components: vented spikes / non vented spikes, drip chambers, roller clamps, Y-connectors, Luer slip/lock connectors, PVC tube, air inlet filters, needle
  2. Raw material: PVC, ABS or PP
  3. Sanitary standard and quality in accordance with the CE, FDA, ISO9001, ISO13485 standards
  4. Packing； PE or Blister pouch, Inner box, Export carton. OEM can be arranged

 

 

The main structure of disposable intravenous infusion set:

The secondary intravenous infusion set is mainly composed of a medicine inlet cap, a medicine inlet joint, a catheter, a flow stop clip, a liquid medicine filter, a medicine outlet joint, and a medicine outlet guard cap. The catheter is mainly made of soft polyvinyl chloride (PVC) material for blood transfusion (liquid) appliance, medicine feeding cap, medicine inlet joint, flow stop clamp, liquid medicine filter, medicine outlet joint, medicine outlet cap It is mainly made of acrylonitrile-styrene-butadiene copolymer (ABS) material.

Scope of application:

Disposable intravenous infusion set performance and use:

The disposable intravenous infusion set can be equipped with a liquid medicine filter, which is mainly used for infusion devices (infusion sets, infusion pumps, syringes, micro-injection pumps), and is used when the infusion liquid medicine needs to be lengthened.

excerpt.rendered:
Transparent & flexible drip chamber
15 micron fluid filter in drip chamber
Soft and kink resistant PVC tubing ensures uniform flow rate
Smooth roller clamp facilitates easy, safe control and adjustment of fluid rates
Standard tube length : 150 cms
Tube dia : I Ø 3.0 mm, O Ø 4.1 mm
